text: Tse ye shcho vy budete propoviduvaty, ta steadfastly budete pidtrymaty shcho vy nakazuyetesʹ shchob zrobyty, ta ne sliduyete za yikhnimy bazhannyamy. Ta proholoshuyutʹ: "YA viryu v vsim svyatym pysannyu poslanym vnyz BOHOM. YA buv nakazanyy shchob pryymaty rishennya sered vas equitably. BOH ye nash Lord ta vash Lord. My mayemo nashi spravy ta vy mayete vashi spravy. Nemaye arhumentu mizh namy ta vamy. BOH zbere nas vsikh razom; yomu yavlyaye soboyu ostatochnu dolyu
